short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple start page with url shortcuts, todo list and web search function.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New tab with improved search functionality and better organization of shortcuts to increase your productivity. This is your new home page that you can customize to your needs.

Main features:
— Advanced search function with query history and customizable search engine
— Customizable shortcuts to your favorite sites
— Todo list with notifications
— Weather forecast for your location
— Date and time information
— Beautiful dynamic backgrounds
— Personalized welcome header
and a lot more!

Please see a live demo of the Board App: https://board.coredata.pl
